Description:
Options are a plenty here.
Options are a plenty here. This retro three bedroom home could be a great family home or the perfect investment.
Set on a 686m2 (approx.) allotment this light filled home features three bedrooms, two with built in robes, separate kitchen and dining, spacious living area, bath with overhead shower plus toilet.
With a two car carport plus a two car garage, off street parking, a small shed with separate outdoor toilet and located just a short stroll from the likes of Bellarine Village Shopping Centre, Newcomb Central Shopping Centre, East Geelong Primary School, Gordon Tafe Campus & Geelong Racecourse you definitely should consider this as a new family home or adding this to your property portfolio.
Insights: 33 Hickey Street, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Enter The Market In Style
Here is your opportunity to step into the Geelong market in style.
Offering four bedrooms, two bathrooms and two living spaces this is a rare floor plan with ample space for the entire family. Renovated and updated throughout you can move in with ease with nothing to do.
Nestled in a quiet pocket on the cusp of inner city living close to local schooling, shopping and Geelong CBD this is the ultimate entry into the Geelong market.
Whether you are looking to nest or invest with a potential rental return of approximately $400-$420 per week you will enjoy this solid investment for years to come.
Extra features:
- Gas heater & split system
- Renovated and updated throughout
- Workshop
- Outdoor entertaining area
- Established gardens
- Secure and private yard
- Approximately 591m2 block size
- Quiet court location
- Minutes stroll to schooling and shopping
- Easy access to the Geelong waterfront
- Walking distance to local parks and oval
- Potential rental approximately $400-$420 per week.

Description:
Plentiful Land, Perfect Potential!
Looking to enter into the property market or wanting to start or add to your investment portfolio, then this property offers Impressive options with endless advantages.
This well-maintained Brick Veneer property certainly has a lot to offer, features three generous sized Bedrooms, spacious Lounge with gas heating, fully appointed functional Kitchen including a Dishwasher and a separate meals area with split system heating and cooling.
The Bathroom and Laundry are both of good size, with the added advantage of a second shower room.
Through the kitchen/dining, glass sliding doors lead out to the undercover outdoor pergola built for entertaining. The exceptionally large rear garden can only be described as a kids' haven.
This property offers an impressive large double driveway, with undercover carport and access to the backyard with ample space for additional cars, a boat or caravan. A double lock up garage and an additional shed for those who love to tinker or are looking for extra storage space.
All this on an approx. 687m2 of land, this well-kept single level BV three-bedroom home offers a sensational opportunity to secure a home with the potential to renovate, extend or redevelop (STCA) or just enjoy as is.
Enjoy the convenience of neighbouring schools and walking distance to public transport and shops including Newcomb Centro shopping centre, Splashdown, St. Albans football ground as well as plenty of parks and walking tracks close by.
Currently periodic leased at $300.00 per week.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Calling first home buyers and investors.
Great opportunity to secure this three bedroom brick veneer family home on a huge 730m2 (approx.) allotment.
The home comprises of three bedrooms, master with built in robe, good sized lounge room with gas log fire heating and air conditioning for year round comfort, dining, light filled functional kitchen, good sized bathroom and separate laundry. Additional features include a large remote controlled garage, utilities room for additional storage and a huge back yard. Located just 10 minutes from Geelong CBD and ideally located in close proximity to several well regarded primary and secondary schools, Eastern Beach, Newcomb Centro, Aldi, Bellarine Village shopping centre, plenty of access to public transport and less than 30 mins drive to some of the Surf Coast's best beaches.

One for the property portfolio.
This renovated low maintenance home on a huge 724m2 allotment (approx.) consists of three light filled bedrooms, master with built in robe, kitchen/dining with large floating bench space, large bright living area, bathroom with corner bath and OHS, WC and separate laundry. Located just 10mins from Geelong CBD and ideally located in close proximity to several well regarded primary and secondary schools, Newcomb Centro, Aldi, Bellarine Village Shopping Centres on your doorstep. Description:
Calling All Developers & Builders!
Set upon an impressive 980m2 (approx.) and boasting a 21-metre (approx.) frontage, this property is bursting with infinite potential! Whether you're on the hunt for the ultimate development site or searching for a large block to build your dream family home with plenty of room for work sheds, etc (STCA), this property will be at the top of your list!
A convenient lifestyle is part of the package, with life's amenities just moments away. The morning school run has never been easier thanks to East Geelong Primary School just across the road and Newcomb Secondary College within close reach. The Gordon Tafe's East Geelong Campus is also footsteps away, while fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the nearby St. Albans Reserve. Public transport is an instant from your front door, while the shopping centres on Bellarine Highway provide you with all of your shopping essentials.
The original weatherboard home consists of an open plan living/dining zone, generous lounge, kitchen with oven and gas hob, two bedrooms (one with kitchenette), two bathrooms, and a powder room. A gas wall heater and ceiling fan provide comfort.
The expansive yard is home to established trees, including a wide selection of fruit trees - enjoy picking nectarines, olives, lemons, apples, oranges, and lilly pilly berries straight from the branch while you're hard at work! An array of garden sheds provides ample storage, while tradies will definitely be inspired to construct their ultimate garage or work shed (STCA). The long driveway provides vehicle access to the backyard, where a carport and shed provide covered parking.
Whether you have dreams of developing potentially lucrative townhouses, or are longing to build your forever home on a spacious block of land (STCA), you'll need to act quickly to snap up this potential-packed gem! Inspect without delay!
Insights: 217 Boundary Road, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 6 other 2 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
GENEROUS BLOCK IN GROWTH POCKET
This updated Brick 3 bed, 1 bath DLUG home set on almost 730m2 approx block presents an array of options.
Set behind a high private fence in a quiet street in central Whittington this property would suit many buyers whether you are a developer (STCA), FHB, downsizer with all the hard work done or a savvy investor with a potential rent of $340 pw.
Comprising of large L shaped lounge room offering brand new carpets, good natural light, new ceiling fan, split system AC/Heat and a gas Bramear wall heater for all year round comfort.
A modern updated kitchen with Whirlpool 900mm 5 burner gas stove, ample storage and SS dishwasher. The meals area flows beautifully off the kitchen and seats up to 6 comfortably and there is still room for a small second seating area or study space.
Down the hall you will find 3 good size bedrooms all with BIR, ceiling fans and brand new carpets. There is also a bright updated central bathroom offering full size bath, vanity storage, toilet and separate shower with rain head plus heat lamps for those cold mornings.
Outside you will find a new pitched undercover pergola, ideal for summer entertaining and a large flat rear yard catering to pets and kids. There is also an oversized DLUG and ample parking in the driveway for an extra 3 cars.
This property is ideally located walking distance to local shops, 2 km to Geelong CBD and a stone throws to parks and Newcomb SC.
FEATURES
8 Solar panels to reduce bills.
Split system AC/Heat
730 m2 Block
Rent pw $340

Description:
VERY NEAT STAND ALONE TOWNHOUSE
Conveniently located this standalone townhouse with no common ground will please the investor or downsizer wanting comfort and convenience. Perfectly presented with generous kitchen and meals area, electric cooking and split system, separate lounge and two good size bedrooms with BIR's. Bathroom containing separate bath and shower, laundry and separate toilet. Remote access to single garage and a rear garden shed. Low maintenance gardens complete this very tidy package. Across the road to the bus stop will cater for all your travelling and shopping. Currently tenanted to a lovely lady until 30/01/2019 @ $265.00 per week.

Description:
SPACIOUS TOWN HOUSE LIVING
This 2 bed, 1 bath, SLUG town house on its own title is one that won't last long. With beautiful floating floors throughout .The large bright light filled lounge room offers wall heater and air conditioner, flowing into your meals area that seats up to 6, the compact kitchen offers overhead cupboards and plenty of bench space, gas cooking & a great size pantry. Off the hall way you have 2 spacious bedrooms both with BIR, the main bathroom has bath tub, shower, vanity and separate toilet. Outside is a lovely private court yard and an amazing size front yard perfect for a small pet. Close to local schools, shopping centers and public transport. This neat town house is sure to impress.
• Block out blinds
• TV points in both bedrooms
• Rent pw $260

Description:
Superb starter or easy investment.
Providing an extremely neat interior with three bedrooms this brick veneer home is an affordable people-pleaser for first-time buyers or investors looking to jump into the market. Completely comfortable as is yet with great potential to redesign or personalise if desired, the residence features a spacious L-shaped lounge upon entrance that provides access to the practical kitchen that overlooks a large second living area. All three bedrooms (with BIR's) are situated towards the rear of the property close by the central bathroom and separate laundry. Positioned a generous 637m2 (approx.) allotment outside offers a DLUG with workshop area, single carport or potential outdoor entertaining area and ample grassed yard still left over for pets and children to enjoy. Located just a short stroll to Splashdown and local shops on the Bellarine highway the home also provides easy access to Newcomb Central, schools for all ages, which are only a 2 minute drive away, and Geelong's CBD a 5 minute commute. Enquire today to secure this fantastic home before you miss out.

Description:
Large allotment close to town
Put this home high on your list to inspect, you will be pleasantly surprised with all this home has to offer.
Minutes from local shops, schools, public transport and only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and coastal areas, the convenience of this location can not be questioned. Comprising formal lounge, kitchen with new electric wall oven and a 900mm gas cooktop, an adjoining 2nd living area which opens out to the pergola/entertaining area, three generous bedrooms, master with a walk in robe and access to the main bathroom providing a shower over the bath. There is a separate toilet and separate updated shower room. Extras include ducted heating, recently resealed roof tiles, wall USB chargers, recently upgraded switch board and lighting, newly painted throughout, new porcelain floor tiles. There is a single garage with extra length for storage as well as two additional carspaces at the front of the property. The rear yard is sure to impress, providing plenty of room for children to play, allotment approx 842sqm. If you are searching for a first home or investment, this property is perfect. Potential rental income $340 - 360/week.
Make your enquiries today!

Description:
Astounding Unit with Minimalist Touch
Prepare to be amazed by this sensational 2-bedroom unit that promotes simplicity and practicality for its residents. Relax after a day full of activity in the fully carpeted expansive living area that comprises of an immaculate interior and tranquil atmosphere. Open the sliding door and let the soothing breeze from your nice and private courtyard flow in. Both bedrooms include a B.I.R and a wall heater. Also featuring a generously spaced kitchen area with 4 gas cooktops, stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and oven), classy central bathroom, a chic alfresco, a secure garage and split system heating/cooling.
Buses #40 and #30 are within walking distance. Woolworths, Geelong Racecourse, Gordon Institute of TAFE and Geelong East Primary School are all located within a short drive away.
Do not miss this fantastic opportunity to live in or invest!

Description:
Peaceful & Secure Own Title
Conveniently positioned, this delightful low maintenance residence is sure to please. Providing light filled accommodation with a flexible floor plan that ensures comfortable living. Consisting of three bedrooms (BIRs), kitchen and dining area flowing to north facing undercover entertaining plus separate lounge. Features include gas ducted heating, private rear yard and remote garage with secure internal access. Located on an easy care allotment of approx. 253sqm with no body corporate. Within easy reach of Bellarine Village Shopping, public transport, Geelong CBD and the Waterfront in minutes. A delightful residence that is ready for your inspection!

Description:
Superbly Refreshed, Conveniently Located
As solid as they come and ready for a new owner seeking maximum convenience in this peaceful locale. Ideal for first home buyers, families, downsizers or the savvy investor seeking massive growth.
Consisting of three bedrooms all with BIR'S, updated central bathroom, open plan living, updated kitchen and dining area. Positioned on a corner allotment of approx. 549sqm (north facing rear yard) with single car lock up garage and single carport. Rounding out this sensational offering is the generous sized entertaining area perfect for all year round while being surrounded by a low maintenance garden. Features include, dishwasher, gas top cooking, gas heating and split system
Located within easy distance to Bellarine Village Shopping, Public transport and just minutes to Geelong CBD. Sure to be popular book your inspection today!

Description:
Refreshed for Easy Living
Only take one step inside and you will feel at ease with the detail, love and passion that has been poured into this beautiful family home. In the heart of this home is the gorgeous kitchen with the elegant stone bench tops and high-end appliances. The kitchen features an electric Fisher & Paykel cooktop and oven, along with a stainless-steel dishwasher. It is accompanied by exquisite matte black tap wear and sink along with an abundance of storage. The spacious dining and second lounge area accompanies new timber look vinyl and extra storage space for all that special glass wear. This stunning home also includes three good sized bedrooms, central family bathroom, ducted heating and cooling and two living areas. Set on a huge block of 702m2 (approx.) it is sure to impress.
In this superb location hidden away in a cosy court it is only a stone's throw away from parks, local football ovals and only a short drive to shopping centers. This quiet location has something for everyone.
From the front door you will be wowed by the fire place, brand-new carpet and timber look vinyl throughout. The three bedrooms are all at a good size, the master enjoys a walk-in robe and ensuite. The other two bedrooms include built in robes and new white shutters. The open living-dining area enjoys an abundance of storage and sliding doors which opens out to the amazing undercover patio. If you're an entertainer, this outside area is a perfect spot for a family barbeque or a wine or two. Beyond the patio is a huge backyard surrounded by roses and greenery, this is also accompanied by a garden shed perfect for any green thumb.
Extras include motorized shutters on two of the bedrooms, the ensuite, kitchen and main bathroom. There are also two toilets, a double car garage and loads of natural light. To enjoy all of the hard work that's been put into this extra special home, come along to one of the open for inspections!
